# Scatter pie plots for DemDev project

## TODO
* Pycharm notification 20 keybinding conflicts
* remove pandas use, remove pandas from venv
* `pyinstaller app/spie.py` test
* `pynsist installer.cfg` test

  `nsist.wheels.NoWheelError: No compatible wheels found for matplotlib 3.10.8`
  
  - likely python / wheel version mismatch, but 3.10.8 good for python >= 3.10

## Directory contents
* app: pynsist application module
* main.spec: generated by pyinstaller
* dist: distribution created by pyinstaller

## Documentation
* [pyplot.scatter](https://matplotlib.org/stable/api/_as_gen/matplotlib.pyplot.scatter.html)
